name: Sheldon Soble
description: I am a very simple Man, so down to earth , I do all my best to be honest because I know honesty is said to be the best legacy ever.I am strong and Hardworking, I hardly Depend on people but i do everything to make people happy, when everybody Around me is Happy then I am Happy.I am a good Christian and a Believer and I enjoying Listening to real cool Gospel musics that touches the soul. I am a very Open person it takes me forever to hide my feelings and i must tell you I am also a very Funny person so you must be ready to laugh always lol .I really Believe in the old school way of loving and treating a woman, i believe in Kissing , Cuddling all nights, walking hand in hand in the beach , chasing up each other in the beach , travelling and going everywhere together when its necessary,cooking together and doing all the Home works together wow that makes a better and happy family
